tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Implant Fixing,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review:
Dr. Abhijit Shetty is a patient-friendly doctor. During the last 15 months I had several appointments with him for various dental problems including   RCT, denture bridge and 4 implants, all necessitated by a fall. 

He helped me with immediate care with a lot of patience and compassion to overcome the trauma.

Very satisfied with the way he explains everything in detail to make the patient comfortable before each procedure. 

He has also been a good doc to my family including my grandchildren.

Would highly recommend Dr.Abhijit Shetty to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Indeed it was a Superb experience. I was tensed for my daughter's (she is 8 years old).front teeth as it was broken.But i got relief when I met Dr.Abhijit, the treatment was done with ease.Thanks alot doctor for the smooth treatment, your positive Vibes and patience Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Hi, my name is Indu Thakare. I got Dr. Abhijeet Shetty's reference from a friend . At first I just went for a consultation as developing a trust with the dentist is very important as a patient. But Dr. Abhijeet explained the problem and the solution to it in a very cool manner and didn't make me think of it as a very big issue and I really liked his confidence during the process. My dental treatment went very well and without too much pain. The best part is that his fees are very pocket friendly and doesn't put a big hole in your wallet. Really good patient handling . I would say , Happy Roots will now be my permanent place for mine and my family's dental care. Would highly recommend everyone to consult with Dr. Abhijeet for any dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very experienced and professional. Very helpful and very informative. I would definitely recommend Dr. Abhijit for any Dental advice and issues. Totally made me feel very comfortable and Totally seemed like family. I've never ever had this wonderful experience. Less pain and more relaxed and relieved. **** ************* *** total expertise in Dental care. I'm truly grateful and blessed to have such a kind and very down to earth who really cares for their patients. A total visionary. Thank you so much for being there when it hurt the most. I feel like a new person. Value 4 money. Very affordable too.
